title: After Life Communications - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/15/18
itunes:title: After Life Communications - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/15/18
description:
George Noory and philosopher Jonathan Zap explore methods to allow communicate with people in the afterlife, and whether science and technology will make that task easier.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
